Name: 放置勇者：远征/Idle Heroes:Odyssey
About the game: After the heroes defeated the dragon, why did they embark on an expedition again? No-brainer Heroes popular heroes appeared again, in the inheritance of the hero set on the basis of new skills, more new powerful heroes to fight! Each hero has unique characteristics and advantages, strategies with heroes, reasonable use of the fetters to enhance the team's ability to defeat all demons! As many as 180 treasure pieces Inherit the No-brainer Heroes critically acclaimed treasure match play. Each treasure has its own special effects, understanding the hero skills and characteristics, reasonable selection and matching treasure equipment, looking for the strongest genre of routines. New skill combination play Each hero has at least 30+ skills. Active skills, as basic skills, can be enhanced by passive skills, changing trigger logic, attacking targets, and additional effects or characteristics. You can concentrate your passive skills on an active skill to get an ultimate skill that destroys the sky. You can strengthen your basic attributes to be a veritable muscular man, and you can also strengthen your aura skills to become a pendant tool. How many genres of heroes can be constructed from diversified skill combinations waiting for you to explore. Extremely rich level gameplay As a leader, how do you allocate the brave to different levels of adventure? 1. Expedition forest-forest need hard power, develop hang up is the key. 2. Expedition hang up-grope for the highest production efficiency team configuration, don't forget to take to open the treasure chest the tools. 3. Training ground- rapidly promote a good place for awakening metempsychosis hero hero level. 4. Mines-equip your heroes with miners’ work permits and send them to mines. Treasures such as golden pickaxe and miner's hat can double the efficiency of your hero. 5. Jungle-Heroes equipped with an adventure certificate can enter the jungle treasure hunt. Of course not all heroes have the qualifications to obtain an adventure certificate. 6. Double Secret Realm-Double Secret Realm that only men or women are allowed to enter. Do you want to go with your best all-girl cast? Characteristic town work Not only can you send heroes out on expeditions and adventures, but you can also arrange jobs for them in towns. Arranging heroes into buildings can provide different bonuses to buildings. There are castles, taverns, equipment shops, blacksmith shops, merchants, training grounds and other buildings in the town. The rich town management can help you improve your team.
